title: Celebrate Deepavali with freedom and in the spirit of unity, says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) “With peace restored in the country, Hindus can now celebrate this festival with freedom and in the spirit of unity that is marked by the increased harmony and understanding among communities irrespective of ethnic, religious and other differences that have kept them apart for a…
